thread.title: Video: Akshay Kumar dances to ‘Chura ke dil mera’ amidst hundreds of frenzied college kids in Noida | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
thread.title_full: Video: Akshay Kumar dances to ‘Chura ke dil mera’ amidst hundreds of frenzied college kids in Noida | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Video: Akshay Kumar dances to ‘Chura ke dil mera’ amidst hundreds of frenzied college kids in Noida | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text:
'Jolly LLB 2' star Akshay Kumar is on a promotional overdrive, he was in Delhi last evening to promote his February 10 release to college students at the Amity University in Noida. Khiladi Kumar was joined by his co-star Huma Quereshi on-stage, and the two enthralled hundreds of frenzied kids at the university compound. Akshay who plays Jolly , a lawyer, in his upcoming film, posed with a bunch of law school students. 

Highlight of the evening was Akshay Kumar shaking a leg to his all time superhit track "Chura Ke Dil Mera". His co-star Huma Quereshi joined him, and two were a delight to watch as they danced to this cult song from 'Main Khiladi Tu Anari' that starred Akshay Kumar and Shilpa Shetty in lead roles. He shared his excitement on social media. 




After interacting with their young fans, the 'Jolly LLB 2' stars got down to take some crazy selfies. Akshay posted one of them to his social media handle with the message.
